mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaDbmsVerCdM.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , DBMS_CD , DBMS_VER_VAL , DBMS_VER_CNTS , DBMS_VER_RMK , OPSC_YN , REGRT_EMPNO , REG_DTM , US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_DBMS_VER_CD_M WHERE DBMS_CD = #{dbms_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DBMS_VER_VAL = #{dbms_ver_val, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
